languages.text: Высокий фактотум Янрис Данрок пал, прикрывая своим необъятным телом Мастера вокса от разрушительных атак. Отточенный годами вычислений разум безжалостно подсказал ему, что надежды нет ни на победу, ни на спасение, а значит, лишь одно имело значение — подать весть о страшной беде другим.

High Factotum Janris Danrok fell, shielding the Vox Master from devastating blows with his corpulent body. Honed by many years of calculations, his mind correctly predicted there was no hope of victory or salvation, and so spreading the news of the terrible disaster to others was the only thing that mattered.
languages.original_text: Высокий фактотум Янрис Данрок пал, прикрывая своим необъятным телом Мастера вокса от разрушительных атак. Отточенный годами вычислений разум безжалостно подсказал ему, что надежды нет ни на победу, ни на спасение, а значит, лишь одно имело значение — подать весть о страшной беде другим.

Honed by many years of calculations, his mind correctly predicted there was no hope of victory or salvation, and so spreading the news of the terrible disaster to others was the only thing that mattered.

languages.text: 高阶顾问詹里斯·丹罗克在战斗中身亡。他牺牲了自己，以肥胖的身体保护了音阵大师，让她免受致命的伤害。由于长年的计算，他早就敏锐地判断出这场战斗根本不可能获胜，也根本不可能存活下来。他意识到，必须把这场可怕的灾难告诉外界，这才是唯一重要的事情。
languages.original_text: High Factotum Janris Danrok fell, shielding the Vox Master from devastating blows with his corpulent body. Honed by many years of calculations, his mind correctly predicted there was no hope of victory or salvation, and so spreading the news of the terrible disaster to others was the only thing that mattered.

traits.locale_text: 高阶顾问詹里斯·丹罗克在战斗中身亡。他牺牲了自己，以肥胖的身体保护了音阵大师，让她免受致命的伤害。由于长年的计算，他早就敏锐地判断出这场战斗根本不可能获胜，也根本不可能存活下来。他意识到，必须把这场可怕的灾难告诉外界，这才是唯一重要的事情。

languages.text: ハイ・ファクトタムのジャンリス・ダンロックは転倒したものの、その肥満した体がヴォクス・マスターを破壊的なダメージから保護した。長年の計算によって磨かれた彼の頭脳は、勝利や救済の望みがないことを正確に予測した。そのため、彼にとって重要だったのは、恐ろしい災害のニュースを他の人々に広めることだけだった。
languages.original_text: High Factotum Janris Danrok fell, shielding the Vox Master from devastating blows with his corpulent body. Honed by many years of calculations, his mind correctly predicted there was no hope of victory or salvation, and so spreading the news of the terrible disaster to others was the only thing that mattered.

traits.locale_text: ハイ・ファクトタムのジャンリス・ダンロックは転倒したものの、その肥満した体がヴォクス・マスターを破壊的なダメージから保護した。長年の計算によって磨かれた彼の頭脳は、勝利や救済の望みがないことを正確に予測した。そのため、彼にとって重要だったのは、恐ろしい災害のニュースを他の人々に広めることだけだった。

languages.text: Le haut factotum Janris Danrok périt en protégeant la maîtresse-vox de coups terribles avec son corps imposant. Aiguisé par de nombreuses années de calcul, son esprit prédit correctement qu'il n'y avait aucun espoir de victoire ou de salut, alors transmettre la nouvelle de la terrible catastrophe était la seule chose qui comptait.
languages.original_text: High Factotum Janris Danrok fell, shielding the Vox Master from devastating blows with his corpulent body. Honed by many years of calculations, his mind correctly predicted there was no hope of victory or salvation, and so spreading the news of the terrible disaster to others was the only thing that mattered.

traits.locale_text: Le haut factotum Janris Danrok périt en protégeant la maîtresse-vox de coups terribles avec son corps imposant. Aiguisé par de nombreuses années de calcul, son esprit prédit correctement qu'il n'y avait aucun espoir de victoire ou de salut, alors transmettre la nouvelle de la terrible catastrophe était la seule chose qui comptait.

languages.text: El Sumo Factótum Janris Danrok cayó protegiendo a la maestra de vocos de un ataque devastador con su rollizo cuerpo. Tras los años que pasó haciendo cálculos, su mente predijo con certeza que no había ninguna esperanza de triunfo ni salvación, por lo que extender la noticia del terrible desastre era lo único que importaba.
languages.original_text: High Factotum Janris Danrok fell, shielding the Vox Master from devastating blows with his corpulent body. Honed by many years of calculations, his mind correctly predicted there was no hope of victory or salvation, and so spreading the news of the terrible disaster to others was the only thing that mattered.

traits.locale_text: El Sumo Factótum Janris Danrok cayó protegiendo a la maestra de vocos de un ataque devastador con su rollizo cuerpo. Tras los años que pasó haciendo cálculos, su mente predijo con certeza que no había ninguna esperanza de triunfo ni salvación, por lo que extender la noticia del terrible desastre era lo único que importaba.

languages.text: Hoch-Faktotum Janris Danrok fiel und schützte die Voxmeisterin mit seinem stämmigen Körper vor vernichtenden Schlägen. Dank seiner langjährigen Berechnungen erkannte er korrekt, dass es keine Hoffnung auf Sieg oder Erlösung gab, und darum zählte nur, die Meldung der schrecklichen Katastrophe zu verbreiten.
languages.original_text: High Factotum Janris Danrok fell, shielding the Vox Master from devastating blows with his corpulent body. Honed by many years of calculations, his mind correctly predicted there was no hope of victory or salvation, and so spreading the news of the terrible disaster to others was the only thing that mattered.

traits.locale_text: Hoch-Faktotum Janris Danrok fiel und schützte die Voxmeisterin mit seinem stämmigen Körper vor vernichtenden Schlägen. Dank seiner langjährigen Berechnungen erkannte er korrekt, dass es keine Hoffnung auf Sieg oder Erlösung gab, und darum zählte nur, die Meldung der schrecklichen Katastrophe zu verbreiten.

languages.text: Arşıkâhya Janris Danrok, cüsseli bedeniyle Voks Üstadı'nı korurken yaralanıp hayatını kaybetti. Hesaplama yaparak geçirdiği onca yılın ardından, hiçbir zafer veya kurtuluş umudu olmadığına dair isabetli tahminlerde bulunmuştu. Artık geriye, önemli olan tek bir şey kalmıştı... O da bu felaketin haberini diğerlerine ulaştırmaktı.
languages.original_text: High Factotum Janris Danrok fell, shielding the Vox Master from devastating blows with his corpulent body. Honed by many years of calculations, his mind correctly predicted there was no hope of victory or salvation, and so spreading the news of the terrible disaster to others was the only thing that mattered.

traits.locale_text: Arşıkâhya Janris Danrok, iri bedeniyle Voks Üstadı'nı korurken yaralanıp hayatını kaybetti. Hesaplama yaparak geçirilen onca yılın ardından herhangi bir zafer veya kurtuluş umudu olmadığına dair isabetli tahminlerde bulunmuştu ve geriye, önemli olan tek bir şey kalmıştı, o da bu felaketin haberini diğerlerine ulaştırmak.
